original: Bjurek, Johan Samuel, kyrkoherde, Trehörna, f. 8/5/96 i Tun, Skarab. 1., av Aron Johansson o. Hilda Svensson. G. m. Edit Andersson. Barn: Sigvard f. 25, Herbert 27, Anne-Marie 41. — Studiex. i Skara 17, fil. kand. 23, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Västerås stift 28, särsk. prövn. f. fil. mag. s. å. Pastradj. i Järna, v. pastor i Aspeboda 29, v. kommin. i Hosjö, kommin. i Tyngsjö 31, kyrkoh. i Trehörna sed. 36. Ordf. i kyrkostämma o. skolråd.
translated: Bjurek, Johan Samuel, pastor (kyrkoherde) in Trehörna, born May 8th, 1896 in Tun, Skaraborg County, son of Aron Johansson and Hilda Svensson. Married to Edit Andersson in a year not specified (but after the birth of their oldest child). Children: Sigvard (born 1925), Herbert (born 1927), Anne-Marie (born 1941). Studied in Skara, receiving his bachelor's degree in 1923, theology degree, practical theology exam, and ordination in the Västerås diocese in 1928, with a special examination for a Master of Arts degree (fil. mag.) in the same year. He was assistant pastor in Järna, assistant curate in Aspeboda in 1929, vicar in Hosjö, curate in Tyngsjö in 1931, and pastor in Trehörna from 1936. He also served as the chairman of the church council and school board.
